definition: Haiti, the western third of Caribbean island Hispaniola
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
Hispaniola (Caribbean Island divided between Dominican Republic and Haiti)
Huaihai, economic hub around Xuzhou 徐州[Xu2 zhou1], including parts of Jiangsu, Shandong, Henan and Anhui provinces
(bird species of China) Pander's ground jay (Podoces panderi)

sentences.english: Saved the meteorological observatory evening to issue the Zhejiang coastal area strong typhoon urgent alarm yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 省气象台昨天傍晚发布浙江沿海地区强台风紧急警报。

sentences.english: The Tahitians taught Captain Cook and his sailors how to make tattoos.
sentences.chinese: 海地人教会了库克船长和他的海员们如何制作纹身。

sentences.english: The Around Bohai Region is the third pole of economic jack-up in China.
sentences.chinese: 环渤海地区是我国经济增长的第三极。

sentences.english: Haitian woman crosses a street of Port-au-Prince February 1, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 穿过海地太子港街道的妇女。

sentences.english: Most importantly the support continues to roll in.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，这些捐助在源源不断地大量输往海地。

sentences.english: WHO is deeply concerned about the cholera outbreak in Haiti.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织深切关注海地的霍乱疫情。

sentences.english: An outbreak of cholera in Haiti continues to spread sickness and worry.
sentences.chinese: 海地霍乱爆发仍在继续传播疾病和忧虑。

sentences.english: So far 796 people have died of cholera in Haiti.
sentences.chinese: 至今海地已有796人死于霍乱。

sentences.english: Gannets are denizens of the open ocean .
However, scientific development of Bohai Sea region has comparative advantage.
sentences.chinese: 但是，环渤海地区的科学发展具有相对优势。

sentences.english: And many Haitians grumbled that the cost of other food needed to fall.
sentences.chinese: 许多海地人都抱怨其他食品成本也需要降低。

sentences.english: Teissier says Marseille has all it takes to be a leader in the Mediterranean region.
sentences.chinese: 泰西耶说，马赛具备成为地中海地区领袖的一切条件。

sentences.english: Marine fishery is an important activity throughout coastland in Zhejiang province.
sentences.chinese: 海洋渔业是浙江沿海地区的一项重要活动。

sentences.english: This kind of thing in coastal areas used more flooding, many in use.
sentences.chinese: 这种东西在沿海地区使用的比较泛滥，很多老千在用。

sentences.english: About 80% of the population were estimated to be living in poverty in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 在2003年，估计约八成海地人口生活在贫穷线下。

sentences.english: Inning of tidal flats is an important approach to keep the amount of field acreage on an appropriate level.
sentences.chinese: 滩涂围垦是沿海地区耕地占补平衡的重要手段。

definition: variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
Puerto Rico, self-governing unincorporated territory of the United States
